titleStmt.title: Mysteries unvailed wherein the doctrine of redemption by Jesus Christ, flowing from the glorious grace and everlasting love of God, the very fountain of life and salvation unto lost sinners, is handled : the most usuall Scriptures explained and reasons answered, which are urged for the universality of the death of Christ for all persons : vvherein the unsoundness of this opinion, together with divers other conclusions as depending upon it, are discovered and the truth unvailed / by Robert Garner.
titleStmt.author: Garner, Robert.

titleStmt.title: Mysteries unvailed wherein the doctrine of redemption by Jesus Christ, flowing from the glorious grace and everlasting love of God, the very fountain of life and salvation unto lost sinners, is handled : the most usuall Scriptures explained and reasons answered, which are urged for the universality of the death of Christ for all persons : vvherein the unsoundness of this opinion, together with divers other conclusions as depending upon it, are discovered and the truth unvailed / by Robert Garner.
titleStmt.author: Garner, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Running title: Mysteries unveiled concerning redemption by Jesus Christ.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Numerous errors in paging, including repetition of p. 25-32.
Imperfect: pages cropped and stained with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
